issue.title: Missing splitted filters for the "Report an issue" form.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

These new splitted filters are missing for the "Report an issue" form. If the user enables one of them and tries to report a issue, they will not appear in the form. Only the "AdGuard Annoyances" filter appears in the form.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Form](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35523759/180346872-6c5e98c1-8c2f-44d8-bca1-694902a9c441.png)
</details>

### Proposed solution

Add splitted filters (AdGuard Cookie Notices, Popups, Mobile App Banners, Other Annoyances and Widgets) to "Report an issue" form.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
I can reproduce it, but this is a limitation of Mozilla to load JS rules.
You should wait for a new release of the extension or add a rule to user rules.
```
tomshw.it#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(-1==document.cookie.indexOf("euconsent-v2")){var d=new MutationObserver(function(){var a=!1,e=document.querySelector("button.iubenda-cs-accept-btn");e&&(e.click(),a=!0),null===document.querySelector("button.iubenda-cs-accept-btn")&&a&&d.disconnect()});d.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0,attributes:!0}),setTimeout(function(){d.disconnect()},1E4)}});
```
